Talk_0029:
It's the right hand, right? So WHY. ISN'T.
THIS. WORKING?!
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?! It's YOU again.<sp:5:0:0> You can't fool me,
looking like that.
Talk_0036:
<sp:1:3:4:68000000>You wasted some of my time, but
no more!
Talk_0037: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Pointing_03>You tricked me! I won't stand for this.
Talk_0038:
I'm doing what you did! Exactly! But it
refuses to work.
Talk_0031: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_00>You back there. Take over for a while!
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Pointing_00>So, Link! You just had to follow me here,
didn't you?
Talk_0040: <sp:1:3:4:2c000000><sp:3:0:2:0901>And I'll steal that power back from you!
